info.name: SGS Moodle fixes
info.description: This is a set of style modifications for use by SGS College staff to improve some aspects of Moodle usability
info.additionalInfo:
Removal of columns not usually required & reduction of cell padding

Modification to the display of hidden items -  making them pale blue instead of hard to read pale grey and the 'Hidden from students' label inline.

Action menu is coloured and made to float as screen is scrolled.
